text: lan kalavaii (26 December 1910 – 11 January 1976) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood and Essendon in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Eric Dalton's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1910 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Essendon Football Club players
title: Eric Dalton (footballer)
